JobFullDesc: Recruitment Brand, Digital Content Manager Think a Big Four career is just spreadsheets, gray suits, and corporate profits? Look again. Deloitte's full-service Marketing Excellence (ME) organization is seeking collaborative creatives, skillful strategists, and marketing masterminds to lead our businesses in exciting new directions. If you're a marketing and communications professional who sees the world differently, finds opportunity where others don't, and keeps a pulse on the next big trends, then become our partner in growth. Together we'll discover new ways to transform out-of-the-box ideas into measurable business results for our clients and our organization. If you're ready to make an impact, join our team to see how we Deloitte differently.Position summaryAs a digital content manager, you will drive the thoughtful execution of social media, while also managing a related digital content strategy for Deloitte's employer brand and recruitment marketing activity. You will provide strategic guidance to leadership and recruiting professionals through a wide range of digital and social activities, such as paid social advertising, SEO, SEM and digital content creation, that build awareness of Deloitte as an employer of choice and ultimately drives engagement with our key audiences. You'll have a wide variety of responsibilities depending on the business and hiring needs, ranging from identifying strategies to reach niche audiences on social media to creating compelling content for key channels. Excellent strategic thinking, project management, communication skills and digital content experience will be critical to success in this role.Work you'll do: Collaborate with the Recruitment Brand & Marketing team, as well as other key stakeholders such as the careers site manager, on programs and projects designed to enhance and evolve our digital presence including channel strategy, experimentation with new channels and tactics and channel governance.Oversee the strategy and day to day execution for our Life at Deloitte social channels including content development and curation, promotion and measurement; facilitate continual innovation and optimization. Oversee and maintain a content calendar for all social media and digital properties.Grow our brand presence across key talent-facing channels (LinkedIn, Glassdoor, Fairygodboss, etc.)Partner with recruiters to understand key hiring priorities to help inform recommendations for and the development of custom digital advertising campaigns; utilize A/B testing to foster better engagement and improve future campaigns.Keep up to date with emerging digital media behavior, trends, and technologies; provide guidance for new tools and technologies as they emerge.Leverage analytic tools to provide reporting and insights, track and improve metrics and influence testing and strategy.QualificationsRequired:Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, communications or related field or equivalent working experience8+ years' experience in brand, marketing, communications, and project management with a passion for social mediaAdvanced knowledge of leveraging social media platforms like LinkedIn, Twitter and Instagram for the purpose of driving brand awareness and engagement, including media buying, ROI measurement and campaign executionExperience with social media publishing platforms (i.e. Sprinklr) and content calendarsCreative problem solver with exceptional communication skills (research, writing, editing, presentation and speaking)Ability to work and manage multiple projects effectively in a fast-paced, innovative environment Previous experience working with a marketing/creative agency a plusHow You'll GrowAt Deloitte, our professional development plan focuses on helping people at every level of their career to identify and use their strengths to do their best work every day. From entry-level employees to senior leaders, we believe there is always room to learn. We offer opportunities to help sharpen skills in addition to hands-on experience in the global, fast-changing business world. From on-the-job learning experiences to formal development programs at Deloitte University, our professionals have a variety of opportunities to continue to grow throughout their career. Explore Deloitte University, The Leadership Center.
